nodes.text: Orten Theb was a male Human bartender living in New Adasta on Ziost during the Galactic War. In 3636 BBY the former Sith Emperor Vitiate came to the world and possessed many of the Imperials on the planet, turning them into his puppets to murder civilians. Orten Theb was among those who was killed during the fighting.
Orten Theb was added to Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan in game update 3.2.
